name: Split over slavery
description: The Methodist Episcopal Church, South formed in 1845 after a split over slavery.

name: Separation from MEC
description: The Methodist Protestant Church separated from the Methodist Episcopal Church in 1828.

name: Reunion into Methodist Church
description: The Methodist Episcopal Church reunited in 1939 to form the Methodist Church.

name: Reunion into Methodist Church
description: The Methodist Episcopal Church, South joined the 1939 reunion forming the Methodist Church.

name: Reunion into Methodist Church
description: The Methodist Protestant Church joined the 1939 reunion forming the Methodist Church.

name: Merger into United Methodist Church
description: The Methodist Church merged with the Evangelical United Brethren Church in 1968 to form the UMC.

name: Merger into United Methodist Church
description: The Evangelical United Brethren Church merged with the Methodist Church in 1968 to form the UMC.
